title: Do you sometimes feel times are changing so fast.
body:
http://i.imgur.com/fqJwf4O.jpg[/img]

you know that episode of wolf and spice? that whole merchant guild(company in those days) all these dudes master plan was smuggle in that tiny speck of gold(renaissance era with wolf lady), but in the time we live and I believe we all live in a developed country, if you ask your parents they would tell even you'll be awe or in disbelief.

a house say maybe the house you live in well at least the house I live in say is over 1mil.
before people have to transform into giant wolf, destroy each other for what ghetto amount of gold. but in today's world say out of the blue you tell your parents to sell their house to buy all gold.

http://i.imgur.com/fBsvQf0.png[/img] 

your dad is like there we go all loaded up, and you stand in the back your dad step on the gas peddle all these gold land on you, your dad would "NOOOOOOOOOOOOOO" he turned into what he love most burger.


it's almost like a mockery..




------------------

anyway doctor has me on lots of colchicine today, I'm just going to take it easy with
playing bdo

http://i.imgur.com/JiBtL2s.jpg[/img]



**by the way here's a thought for GD, in that episode silly Lawrence made the mistake by investing all onto armors. when he went around begging for money, why did his friend refused to help under the reason "you are with a woman"
**

http://i.imgur.com/0b1Yc6d.jpg[/img]
